statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_behavior_data;
SELECT customer_id FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE customer_id = 'c2639a20-5a70-4f12-a9c4-7da9bbdba26e';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, jsonb_array_elements_text(purchase_history->'purchases') AS purchase FROM customer_behavior_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_behavior_data;
SELECT customer_id, json_array_length(purchase_history) AS num_purchases FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_history ->> 'product' = 'shirt';
SELECT customer_id, json_agg(purchase_history) AS all_purchases FROM customer_behavior_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, age, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products;
SELECT customer_name, email, gender FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, email, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 AND stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 40 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT product_name, category, price, recommendations FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, age, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_id, purchase_amount FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM CustomerBehaviorData
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM CustomerBehaviorData GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, category_id, preference_score FROM CustomerPreferences
SELECT id, customer_id, purchase_amount FROM CustomerBehaviorData ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_purchases FROM CustomerBehaviorData GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM CustomerBehaviorData INNER JOIN CustomerPreferences ON CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id = CustomerPreferences.customer_id GROUP BY CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id;

SELECT CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id, CustomerPreferences.category_id, SUM(recommendation_score) AS total_recommendation_score FROM CustomerBehaviorData INNER JOIN ProductRecommendations ON CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id = ProductRecommendations.customer_id INNER JOIN CustomerPreferences ON CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id = CustomerPreferences.customer_id GROUP BY CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id, CustomerPreferences.category_id ORDER BY total_recommendation_score DESC;

SELECT CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id, CustomerPreferences.preference_score, ProductRecommendations.recommendation_score FROM CustomerBehaviorData INNER JOIN CustomerPreferences ON CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id = CustomerPreferences.customer_id INNER JOIN ProductRecommendations ON CustomerBehaviorData.customer_id = ProductRecommendations.customer_id WHERE CustomerPreferences.preference_score > 0.5 AND ProductRecommendations.recommendation_score > 0.7;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_behavior_data;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, recommended_product_id, recommendation_date FROM recommendation_history WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, last_visit_date FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE last_visit_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, recommended_product_id, recommendation_date FROM recommendation_history ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customer_profile WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customers.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC;

SELECT customer_name, email, product_name, category FROM Customers C INNER JOIN PurchaseHistory P ON C.customer_id = P.customer_id INNER JOIN Products Pr ON P.product_id = Pr.product_id WHERE Pr.brand = 'BrandX' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Customers C INNER JOIN Orders O ON C.customer_id = O.customer_id GROUP BY C.customer_id HAVING total_orders > 10 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_date, amount_paid FROM Customers C INNER JOIN PurchaseHistory P ON C.customer_id = P.customer_id WHERE P.amount_paid > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 5;
